body.p: Incorporated in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, in 1864, to explore petroleum deposits in the Kentucky counties of Powell, Clark, and Estill with operations based in Irvine, Kentucky. Founder(s): Joseph Pancoast, Nelson Yocum, Stephen Benton, Marmaduke Moore, George S. Crawford, J. Edgar Thompson, Lewis L. Houpt, Henry C Yarrow, Phillip Wilson, and W. Williamson.
